description:
Notifies and asks for permission if a program wants to get automatically started when Windows is started, or a user is logging on.


What's Changed
Added
- startswith, wildcard and regex filtering of ignored auto starts (
- artifact attestation ( 
Full Changelog: https://github.com/ChristianGalla/AutoStartConfirm/compare/v3.1.8968...v3.2.9134
